channel.title: Height command
channel.description:
I'm working on using Lin's tut on objects to make a more usable verson of runecrafting and I need to get to the (underground) temple of light to get the Death Mystirus runes cords. How ever I can't get there beacuse the trap door allong with many others is not programed.
Could any of you kind people make and post a command (tell me WERE to add it) to change the hight of the player.
The source I am using is testscape

item.title: Height command
item.dc:creator: @Gol_Goroth Gol Goroth
item.description:
@Gol_Goroth wrote:

Allready using back ups.
I’ve used it to get down to varrok sewers and it worked though it did’nt work above the trap door in the mourners head quaters even though both mournings end 1 and 2 are in the game

Read full topic

item.title: Height command
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Err… I don’t know how to explain it, make a backup and do it, then do ::underground ingame.

Read full topic

item.title: Height command
item.dc:creator: @Gol_Goroth Gol Goroth
item.description:
@Gol_Goroth wrote:

Do’s it just chance the height lv?

Read full topic

item.title: Height command
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

This should work :

else if (command.startsWith("underground"))
{
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = (absY  + 6400);
sendMessage("K-ug");
}

If that doesn’t work try this :

else if (command.startsWith("underground") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin"))
{
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = (absY  + 6400);
sendMessage("K-ug");
}

Just to the place where is “admin” put your own name.

Read full topic
